permissions: Allowed for admins or users who have update permission on the certifies record (per the certifies policy).
side_effects: Creates a certification record and schedules expiration handling; if expires_at is in the past, the certification may be set to expired immediately.
validation_notes: Required flags: --certification-type, --certifies-type, --certifies-id. effective_at must be before expires_at when both are provided. certification_type must be compatible with certifies type; for Trucker/Customer certifies, the certification type broker must match certifies broker; for User certifies, the user must have trucker memberships that include the certification type broker. expires_at is required when the certification type requires expiration. status must be one of: editing, submitted, approved, declined, expired, archived.

flags.name: --certifies-type
flags.description: Type of entity to certify (e.g., truckers) (required)

flags.name: --expires-at
flags.validation: YYYY-MM-DD date format; required when certification type requires expiration.

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: One of: editing, submitted, approved, declined, expired, archived.
